for t in range(input()):
    a,b=[int(x) for x in raw_input().split()]
    ds=0
    while a < b and a % 10:
        n=a
        sum=0
        while n>0:
            d=n%10
            sum+=2*d if d%2==0 else d
            n/=10
        ds+=sum%10
        a += 1
    while a < b and b % 10:
            n=b
            sum=0
            while n>0:
                d=n%10
                sum+=2*d if d%2==0 else d
                n/=10
            ds+=sum%10
            b -= 1
    ds += 45 * ((b - a) / 10)
    n=b
    sum=0
    while n>0:
        d=n%10
        sum+=2*d if d%2==0 else d
        n/=10
    ds+=sum%10
    print ds
